fields.name: AnalyticsWorkspaceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace that is used for the logs collection.

fields.name: AvailabilityZones
fields.description: Field deprecated, this value will no longer influence the cluster manager allocation process and will be removed in a future version. The Azure availability zones within the region that will be used to support the cluster manager resource.

fields.name: ClusterVersions
fields.description: The list of the cluster versions the manager supports. It is used as input in clusterVersion property of a cluster resource.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The detailed status that provides additional information about the cluster manager.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: FabricControllerId
fields.description: The resource ID of the fabric controller that has one to one mapping with the cluster manager.

fields.name: ManagedResourceGroupConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of the managed resource group associated with the resource.

fields.name: ManagerExtendedLocation
fields.description: The extended location (custom location) that represents the cluster manager's control plane location. This extended location is used when creating cluster and rack manifest resources.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the cluster manager.

fields.name: VMSize
fields.description: Field deprecated, this value will no longer influence the cluster manager allocation process and will be removed in a future version. The size of the Azure virtual machines to use for hosting the cluster manager resource.
